Text: if you're OCD like me, the screaming bloody murder will piss you off, it's quieter than the standard mp3, but besides that all's good!
Hardly noticeable tho right? I barely can tell the difference :)
with the volume thing you could always just turn on itunes sound check? it makes all the songs in your library the same volume. I think its under "Edit > Preferences > Playback > SoundCheck"
